attributes.action: Force companies to use recycled paper for all junk mail and advertising campaigns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To whom it may concern,

With the ever worsening global changes and the ever increasing amounts of junk mail coming through our letterboxes I think it is about time we made those responsible think a little more about the environment.

In ensuring that only recycled paper was used for these advertising campaigns we would not only help to reduce the landfill crisis but we would also be able to reduce the amount of timber needing to be felled.

Please sign my petition and help to make a difference to our environment.

Many Thanks

Louise

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
